answers.answer: You say your blood sugar level is 127. When? Fasting? After meals? Do you test when you feel dizzy? What do you get then? Do you test two hours after your meals? Dizziness and feeling strange can be symptoms of both being high and being low. I would test at various points, fasting, post prandial and bedtime and when you feel symptoms. If your blood sugar levels at all the tests are in normal range (70-140) and the symptoms continue, I would see your doctor because it could be totally unrelated to blood sugar and diabetes.
thank you, I have checked all the above, 1/2 an hour post dinner, with cake, I was only 107, and two hours later 150, which is pretty normal for me. AM fasting is 140.

question: diabetic, on med, blood sugar level 127, feeling dizzy and over all strange, started this past weekend, thought it was overheated. but still having three days later, stopped drinking a lot of soda, and drinking more water, does any one have any ideas????
title: new onset of dizziness, just feeling strange
